input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='Northlight Real Touch  Pre-Lit Slim Nordmann Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='Lighted Artificial Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 7-ft. Holiday Green Santas Hat Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 6.5' Lighted Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Saratoga Spruce Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Fir Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Calistoga Ornament Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 6' Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Ivy Bronx Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Charlton Home 2.5ft Tall Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Tabletop Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='6Ft Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches, 250 LED Lights And 462 Tips The Holiday Aisle'
  - Name='National Tree Company 4.5-ft. Pre-Lit Multicolor ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 8ft. Slim White Artificial Christmas Tree with 1348 Bendable Branches'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 3 ft. Flocked North Carolina Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 150 Warm White Lights & 545 Bendable Branche'
  - Name='Vickerman 6.5' x 40" Frosted Douglas Fir Artificial Slim Pre-Lit Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 7-ft Douglas fir Pre-lit Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights | T1480'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 7' Nova Scotia Fir Real Touch Artificial Christmas Tree with 400'
  - Name='Haute Decor 4 Foot Lightly Flocked Pre-Lit Alpine Tree'
  - Name='5ft Tall Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches Multi-Color LED Lights Charlton Home'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 6' Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches, 350 LED Lights And 641 Tips Latitude Run'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Real Touch  Pre-Lit Slim Nordmann Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial fir tree with realistic branch technology but slim Nordmann type differs from downswept Douglas Fir, less similar shape and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lighted Artificial Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic lighted artificial fir tree; likely similar function but lacks detail about downswept shape or branch technology, moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 7-ft. Holiday Green Santas Hat Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree but novelty theme (Santa's Hat) reduces similarity in look, construction, and typical use compared to traditional downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 6.5' Lighted Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same approximate height and pre-lit fir tree; lacks specific mention of downswept style or feel real branches, but similar function and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Saratoga Spruce Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-quality artificial tree but spruce species differs from Douglas Fir; Balsam Hill brand and premium materials relevant but species and possibly shape less so.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir tree of Dunhill style, likely similar shape and pre-lit features; relevant but not exact downswept Douglas Fir model.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Calistoga Ornament Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Ornament tree may emphasize decoration over realistic branch tips and traditional shape; species not specified as Douglas Fir; medium relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 6' Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Prelit Douglas Fir tree, close height and category, similar function, shape and construction likely; strong relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 6' Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Prelit Douglas Fir tree, close height and category, similar function, shape and construction likely; strong relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fraser Fir species closely related, premium brand, artificial pre-lit; slightly different species but similar type and realistic design expected.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ivy Bronx Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Douglas Fir species and pre-lit feature; slim profile and snow flocking differ from downswept fullness, but overall similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charlton Home 2.5ft Tall Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Tabletop Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller tabletop size drastically different in scale; same species and pre-lit but intended use and silhouette differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6Ft Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches, 250 LED Lights And 462 Tips The Holiday Aisle
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height, Douglas Fir, pre-lit with realistic branches; slim and snow-flocked differs from downswept green fullness, but very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 4.5-ft. Pre-Lit Multicolor ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, same downswept Douglas Fir style with feel real branches and pre-lit; smaller size, multicolor lighting differs but very close product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 8ft. Slim White Artificial Christmas Tree with 1348 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim and white flocked color with high branch count but generic artificial tree; different style and species not specified; less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 3 ft. Flocked North Carolina Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 150 Warm White Lights & 545 Bendable Branche
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Small size tabletop likely, different species North Carolina Fir, flocked color, warm white lights; somewhat relevant but scale and details differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 6.5' x 40" Frosted Douglas Fir Artificial Slim Pre-Lit Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same height and Douglas Fir species, slim profile and frosted color differ from downswept full green version; pre-lit and silhouette similar enough.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 7-ft Douglas fir Pre-lit Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights | T1480
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar species, pre-lit, and height; flocked white needles differ from green downswept, but product purpose and shape related.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 7' Nova Scotia Fir Real Touch Artificial Christmas Tree with 400
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different fir species (Nova Scotia Fir), real touch technology similar to feel real; similar function but species and details differ moderately.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor 4 Foot Lightly Flocked Pre-Lit Alpine Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Alpine fir species and smaller height, lightly flocked; pre-lit but different construction and intended to be smaller size, less similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 5ft Tall Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches Multi-Color LED Lights Charlton Home
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same species Douglas Fir, pre-lit with realistic branches, smaller height and multi-color lights differ, but close function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 6' Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Prelit Douglas Fir tree at similar height and construction; likely downswept or similar silhouette; closely relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 6' Tall Prelit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Prelit Douglas Fir tree at similar height and construction; likely downswept or similar silhouette; closely relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches, 350 LED Lights And 641 Tips Latitude Run
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Douglas Fir species and pre-lit with realistic branches; slim and snow flocked differs from downswept full green but product type closely related.
